group_1.textLeft: So, care to explain what you were@doing in my territory?

group_1.textRight: I-I'm sorry... I wandered in by accident...

group_1.textLeft: I don't want an apology; I wanna hear about improvements.

group_1.textRight: You don't have to pin it on yourself.@Torayamachi's infringed on us before.

group_1.textLeft: That's why I don't blame her. Besides, we were@chasing a Witch back then anyway...

group_1.textRight: You bitches gotta calm down.
We both know you didn't do it on purpose.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly. We need to talk about how to handle@incidents such as this one.

group_1.textRight: Personally, Juri the Great doesn't care if it's just@a matter of policy.
As long as nobody butts in on someone@else's territory, that's enough for me.

group_1.textLeft: On the other hand, we might run into trouble@if we don't lay out some rules.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... We don't want to fight; we want to@live peacefully like we used to.

group_1.textLeft: We need to have a proper discussion to@hash things out.
Since we've all reached a consensus,@we don't have to bother with that.
Let's just break it up for today... Alright?
Now then...@What are we going to do...?

group_1.textRight: Sis, how long are we gonna drag this jig out?@You musta noticed...

group_1.textLeft: Let's cut it short here...
We don't know who...or what...@might be listening.

group_1.textRight: ...So ya did notice.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed. Something is certainly amiss.

group_1.narration: We found ourselves@in an unsettling version of Futatsugi.@As time went by, we realized a crucial difference:@the entire city was peaceful.
Moreover, Witches appeared without problems,@Kyubey remained present, and the number of@Magical Girls increased by the day...@But most importantly,@the Bloody Tragedy never occurred.
Torayamachi, Ryuugasaki, and Janomiya@are all their own factions,@but there is no warfare between them;@they all cooperate with each other.
A Futatsugi such as this is unthinkable.

group_1.textRight: You don't think...we got sent back in time, do ya?

group_1.textLeft: No, Witches are present here...@Ao, Hikaru, and Sakuya, on the other hand...are not.

group_1.textRight: Ain't seen Ranka around, either.
Looks like you and Juri the Great are the only@livin' people kickin' around right now.

group_1.textLeft: On that note, some of the girls here@shouldn't exist at the same time...
Is this something like...a world of the dead where@all of the timelines have been jumbled up?

group_1.textRight: ...Man, I can't believe this is happenin' to@regular-ass people like us.

group_1.textLeft: That's why I got you to hold your tongue earlier...

group_1.textRight: You drawin' from our experience fightin'@[textYellow:Kimochi] and Uwasa?
Well, as far as [textYellow:Kimochi] go, we've had to@meddle around with their wills, but...

group_1.textLeft: Nonetheless, it's best to take precautions against@an unknown enemy.
If we're not in immediate danger,@we should play dumb.

group_1.textRight: Eh... I guess.

group_1.textLeft: ...Regardless... I'm sure that Miura's magic was@what instigated this.

group_1.textRight: Ya think it could've been an attack by the@spirits she called?

group_1.textLeft: In that case, I assume your offhand remarks@were the trigger...
Saying "we couldn't help it"...felt like a bit of@a backhanded retort, don't you think...?

group_1.textRight: So what did you want me to do, bring up@some "what ifs"?
If only we hadn't gotten rid of Kyubey, or if@only Juri the Great hadn't left your team...
...What I said definitely wasn't good enough,@and I did lose my temper...
But there's no changin' the past...
Besides, I do feel like endin' up the way we@did was inevitable...

group_1.textLeft: ...There was no way around it, in your eyes?

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh...
If they knew about the whole Witch thing,@they would've started huntin' Kyubey anyway.
Less Witches means there would've been@conflict in Futatsugi no matter what.
But that don't change the fact that you@were the one who started the Kyubey hunt,
or the fact that it's Juri the Great's fault for@breakin' off and makin' the fighting worse.

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you justifying our actions...?

group_1.textRight: I can't blame ya for takin' it that way, but...@It's just...
Sure, maybe we coulda said some fancy words@and settled shit out hunky-dory.
But I dunno; somethin' about that feels@backhanded to me.

group_1.textLeft: Whether you're clumsy or sincere...@You're as bad at this as ever, Juri...

group_1.textRight: Unlike you, eh?
Still, no amount of words is gonna make our@crimes any less serious.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed.

group_1.textRight: ...So, ya think a hunger for revenge is what@created this situation?

group_1.textLeft: Hm... No matter how peaceful Futatsugi is,@that disturbs me in and of itself.
And back then...

group_1.narration: "I CAN'T FORGIVE YOU!"@"I CAN'T FORGIVE YOU!"@"I CAN'T FORGIVE YOU!"

group_1.textLeft: From the way they acted, it certainly seems@as though they want revenge...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it does...
